snippet: The Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development forecasts that global growth in gross domestic product will fall as the proportion of older people rises.
abstract: Floyd Norris Off the Charts column on Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development forecasts agrees global growth in gross domestic product will fall as the proportion of older people rises.
lead_paragraph: The Organization for Economic Cooperation and Development forecasts that global growth in gross domestic product will fall as the proportion of older people rises.

headline.print_headline: Slower Growth Seen In a Graying World
headline.seo: Slower Economic Growth Is Seen as Population Ages
headline.main: Slower Growth Seen in a Graying World
